berkelland.fifteen:
For questions about well-being, health, housing, care, work, participation and money matters, you can also visit www.berkellandwijzer.nl
For questions about income support, among other things, you can contact Fijnder.
berkelland.five: After each payment an email is sent with the current credit, in addition you can view the credit by logging into the webshop or by using the Me app.
berkelland.four: You can always find your credit by logging in to the webshop, the credit can be printed out, sent to your email or always at hand by using the Me app.
berkelland.fourteen: Log into the webshop and click on 'Offer'. Then choose the offer you want and click 'Reserve'. Then choose the credit to reserve the offer with. The amount of the offer is deducted from your credit and the offer is reserved for you. You will also see the reservation in the list of reservations on the website. The actual payment takes place when you have the QR code scanned at the provider. Still do not use the offer? Then you can cancel the reservation. If you still have an amount left after the payment, you can continue shopping with that amount.
berkelland.nine: No, you will not be paid the value of the credit in cash.
berkelland.one: Click "Start" at the top right. Enter your e-mail address and the activation code (8 characters) you received by letter. Then click on 'Send'. Your profile has been created and your credit has been activated!
berkelland.seven: No, you do not have to spend the credit at once.
berkelland.six: Return is unfortunately not possible. Exchanging might be, ask the retailer about the possibilities.
berkelland.ten: No, the credit can only be spent at vendors listed on the webshop. You can alert a retailer to the participate application and have them contact Fijnder, 0544-474200.
berkelland.thirteen: No, the credit is strictly personal. You may not give the credit to anyone else. If someone else does use your credit, it will be deducted from your own amount.
berkelland.three: You can find an overview of all providers on the webshop. Go to 'Overview of all providers
berkelland.title: Frequently Asked Questions
berkelland.twelve:
If you think you are entitled to a Child Arrangement, contact Fijnder, 0544-474200. They will check to see if you meet the eligibility requirements.
All adult residents with a minimum income (up to 130% social security standard) are eligible for the Meedoenarrangement. If you think you qualify for the Meedoenarrangement, please contact Fijnder, 0544-474200. They will check whether you meet the conditions.
berkelland.two: There are several ways to do this, the easiest is by e-mail. Click on 'Log in' at the top right. Choose 'Log in by email'. Enter the email address you also used during activation and click 'Send'. Open the email and click on the link you received to log in.

noordoostpolder.eight: By logging in to the webshop, you can view your credit. On the credit page the validity is also listed.
noordoostpolder.eleven: The credit is intended for children ages 4 to 17. Has your child turned 4? Then you can apply for the credit, (0527) 63 39 11. Or download the application form: https: //www.noordoostpolder.nl/meedoenpakket

noordoostpolder.five: After each payment an email is sent with the current credit, in addition you can view the credit by logging into the webshop or by using the Me app.
noordoostpolder.four: You can always find your credit by logging in to the webshop, the credit can be printed out, sent to your email or always at hand by using the Me app.
noordoostpolder.fourteen: Log into the webshop and click on 'Offer'. Then choose the offer you want and click 'Reserve'. Then choose the credit to reserve the offer with. The amount of the offer is deducted from your credit and the offer is reserved for you. You will also see the reservation in the list of reservations on the website. The actual payment takes place when you have the QR code scanned at the provider. Still do not use the offer? Then you can cancel the reservation. If you still have an amount left after the payment, you can continue shopping with that amount.
noordoostpolder.nine: No, you will not be paid the value of the credit in contact money.
noordoostpolder.one: Click on "Start application" at the top. Enter your e-mail address and the activation code you received by letter. Then click on 'Send'. Your account has been created and your Meedoen credit has been activated! You can activate 1 activation code per e-mail address. Do you have multiple activation codes? Then use multiple e-mail addresses.
noordoostpolder.seven: No, you do not have to spend the credit at once.
noordoostpolder.six: No, you cannot exchange or return.
noordoostpolder.ten: No, the credit can only be spent with providers listed on the webshop. You can ask a provider to sign up through the participate application or contact the municipality, (0527) 63 39 11.
noordoostpolder.thirteen: No, the credit is strictly personal. You may not give the credit to anyone else. If someone else does use your credit, it will be deducted from your own amount.
noordoostpolder.three: You can find an overview of all providers in the webshop at 'Providers'.
noordoostpolder.twelve: The Meedoenpakket is intended for children from 4 to 17 years of age whose parents have a low income. Low-income pensioners can also apply for the Meedoenpakket. If you think you or your child(ren) are entitled to the credit, you can apply. Call (0527) 69 93 11 or download the application form: https: //www.noordoostpolder.nl/meedoenpakket

oostgelre.fifteen:
The clothing bank can support you by providing clothing, shoes and textiles. Twice a year you can come to them, for this you need a referral. More information can be found at http://www.kledingbankwinterswijk.nl/home.aspx

Stichting leergeld can support you with school or sports costs, when these costs are not covered by Fijnder, more information can be found at https://leergeldoostachterhoek.nl/welkom

You can borrow toys from the toy bank, a referral is needed. More information can be found at http://www.speelgoedbankoostachterhoek.nl/speelgoed-doneren/ophalen

The food bank can support you when you do not have enough income to buy groceries, for the food bank you need a referral. More information can be found at https://voedselbankachterhoek.nl

For additional financial support you can contact the youth sports fund for the municipality of Berkelland and the municipality of Winterswijk. You can find the conditions at https://jeugdfondssportencultuur.nl/voor-wie/voor-ouders

The Jarige Job foundation can support you in the area of children's parties. For more information, please visit https://www.stichtingjarigejob.nl

winterswijk.ten: No, the credit can only be spent at vendors listed on the webshop. You can alert a retailer to the participate application and have them contact Fijnder, 0544-474200.
winterswijk.thirteen: No, the credit is strictly personal. You may not give the credit to anyone else. If someone else does use your credit, it will be deducted from your own amount.

winterswijk.twelve: If you think you are entitled to a Child Arrangement, contact Fijnder, 0544-474200. They will see if you meet the requirements.
winterswijk.two: There are several ways to do this, the easiest is by e-mail. Click on 'Log in' at the top right. Choose 'Log in by email'. Enter the email address you also used during activation and click 'Send'. Open the email and click on the link you received to log in.

content.accessibilityOverview: A current and complete listing of accessibility statements under the responsibility of Municipality {{organization_name}} is available at the following link:
content.alternative: Alternative: [whether an accessible alternative is available; and if so, which one].
content.available_online: all evaluation and research results on which the claim is based are available online(see under the heading Evaluation and research results
content.cause: Cause: [reason why requirement could not (yet) be met].
content.complianceCriteria1: the research includes all content that must be made accessible according to Temporary Decree on Digital Government Accessibility;
content.complianceCriteria2: the study is based on measurement and survey data that are no more than 12 months old;
content.complianceCriteria3: the manual evaluation was performed in accordance with an adequately documented evaluation method; WCAG-EM or equivalent;
content.complianceCriteria4: For the (semi-)automatic tests, a testing tool based on the algorithms documented by the Auto-WCAG Community Group was employed;
content.complianceCriteria5: all study results are accurately, unambiguously and reproducibly recorded in human-readable format OR in machine-readable format EARL;
content.complianceCriteria6: for each individual deviation from the requirements found during the examination that could not be repaired is indicated:
content.complianceStatusDescription1: Municipality of {{organization_name}} declares that this website partially complies with Temporary Government Digital Accessibility Decree.
content.complianceStatusDescription2: Accessibility research has shown that not all requirements are yet met. For each individual deviation from the requirements, the cause is known and the consequence has been described, measures have been taken to eliminate the deviation and a concrete planning has been made by when the measures will be implemented.
content.complianceStatusLinkDescription: See under the heading Explanation of Compliance Status for more detailed information.
content.declarationDescription1: This statement was prepared at {{date}} with the consent of the responsible director of Municipality {{organization_name}}.
content.declarationDescription2: The timeliness, completeness and accuracy of this statement were last reviewed at {{revision_date}}.

content.expectationsList2: We will inform you of the progress and outcome.
content.expectationsList3: Within 3 weeks, your request will be completed.
content.expectationsTitle: What can you expect from us?
content.explanationComplianceStatusDescription1: This section further substantiates the claim that the requirements set forth in Temporary Decree on Digital Government Accessibility have been partially met.
content.explanationComplianceStatusDescription2: The website {{implementation_name}} {{organization_name}} has been examined for accessibility and the report shows, according to Municipality {{organization_name}}, that all of the following features have been met:

content.introParagraph1: Municipality {{organization_name}} strives to make its own online information and services accessible, in accordance with Temporary Decree on Digital Government Accessibility.
content.introParagraph2: This accessibility statement applies to the content of the website {{implementation_name}} {{organization_name}} that falls within the scope of Temporary Decree on Digital Government Accessibility.

privacy.five: You will receive notifications about your usage and provider offerings. You can turn this off in the notification preferences after the application itself when you log in to the website.
privacy.four: The data is used to see if you are entitled to the scheme and to avoid duplicate awards. What data is requested depends on the scheme.

groningen.eight: You always have the right to view, modify and/or delete your personal data. You can find the personal data you entered on your Stadjerspas account.
groningen.five: Children living at home up to age 18 are automatically credited to your account.
groningen.four: This allows us to see if you are entitled to a City Pass.
groningen.nine: View the general privacy statement of the Municipality of Groningen. For questions, please call the Municipality of Groningen at tel: 14 050.
groningen.one: The following information is stored when applying for the City Pass.
groningen.seven: We like to keep you informed about your usage. Are your credits running low? Then you will receive a message from us. Always useful! Of course you can turn this off yourself if you do not want these messages.
groningen.six: This allows you to see for yourself what you have used and how much credit you have left. The provider and the municipality of Groningen also see what has been consumed. But they cannot see that this is your expenditure.
groningen.three: With this we look up your information and you don't have to fill in your information over and over again.
groningen.title: Privacy Statement
groningen.title_nine: Want to know more or have questions?
groningen.title_seven: Receiving messages about your City Pass
groningen.two: This is required to create your account and ensure that you will soon have access to your account.

privacy.seven: You have the right to access, modify and delete your data. For more information, or if you have questions, please see the municipality's general privacy statement.
privacy.six:
The data is also used if you need support in using the system. The data is processed confidentially and not disclosed to third parties for other purposes.
In the system and in the corresponding mobile app, you will find an overview of the data you have entered.
privacy.three: So that you can see what credits you have used. The providers and municipality also see what has been used, but they do not see that you have used it.
privacy.title: Privacy Statement
privacy.two: To create your account and access your credit.
